title.bibl: La Parola dei Socialisti, July 11, 1914. Lectures by the Hon. Arturo Caroti

div.bibl: La Parola Dei Socialisti, July 11, 1914. LECTURES BY THE HON. ARTURO CAROTI

body.p: The first three lectures given by Hon. Arturo Caroti on Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday evenings, turned out successfully - judging from the enthusiasm displayed by the [large audience] that attended them.
To give a resume of those lectures would be very arduous, because the lecturer expressed many things, facts and ideas with a sincerity and beauty of form, that only the Hon. Deputy is capable of.
More than 500 socialist workers and sympathizers attended the lectures, and next Saturday, Hon. Arturo Caroti will give another lecture at the Chicago Commons' Hall.
